title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: The girl still counselled waiting till morning before raising any alarm, but Miss Greenhill, with many reproaches, insisted on having the police, and went with her servant for the purpose, being afraid to remain in the house alone. In Minto Street they came upon a policeman, and took him back with them to the cottage.

title: Lucy, Francis and Cousin Bill. A novel, etc
author: Wistan, Aden.
snippet: Lucy smiled, as if to say she understood, and they drove off. There was little speaking until they were near the end of Minto Street, when a subdued laugh from Lucy broke the silence. Her sister only looked at her.
